Date: Wednesday, 2/12/1990
Subject: Contract offer
FYI- Malibu has offered me a better contract!
They offer a little more money.

Regards,
Florentino Arana



Date: Thursday, 2/13/1990
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Malibu has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Florentino Arana



Date: Tuesday, 2/18/1990

So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Herman Bauer

I'm looking forward to playing with Minnesota!

Regards,
Herman Bauer



Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1990
Subject: Progress of Albert Alvarez
Dear Sir,
Albert Alvarez has nothing more to prove at AA New Britain Rock Cats!
He has an AVG of .278 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: My role in this team
Sir,
I believe that I am deserving more than being a reliver.
I want a spot in the rotation, I think
I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Steven Putz
